cs source is better than cs go

I've been playing Counter Strike since 1.6, I'm a big fan of this game. It is both simple and complex at the same time, it can be slow but interesting, it is not an ordinary shooter, CS is teamwork and individual skill that has been honed over the years: pitching, aim and much more! The only thing missing is a good anti-cheat, without it sometimes it becomes very sad. But we still love CS:GO
